comments:
I'm running Eclipse 3.0 final release and I tried to update it to 3.0.1 via the 
software updates option in the help menu. It downloaded the jars, installed 
them and then asked me if I wanted to restart Eclipse. On restart, an error 
window popped up and a logfile was generated in C:\eclipse\configuration:

It seems that some libraries have not come through the update?

dup of bug 74624 (fixed in 3.1 and 3.0.2)

Try downloading the 3.0.1 SDK and unzip it on top of the (corrupted) 3.0 
install. Then restart with -clean.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 74624 ***

traces.message: No application id has been found.
